features.userTierSystem: 3-tier user system (Guest, LocalStorage, Authenticated) with permission-based UI

changes: Added 3-tier user system: Guest (spectate only), LocalStorage (casual games), Authenticated (full access)
Guest tier: Can only spectate games, prompted to login/register to play
LocalStorage tier: Can create/join casual games, ranked mode disabled
Authenticated tier: Full access to ranked games, ELO tracking, and stats
Added upgrade prompts for guests in PlayContent
Fixed auth persistence bug - improved token refresh logic
Updated QuickPlayPanel to use tier-based permissions for ranked mode
